summary: An Ordinance providing for the payment of the cost and expense of the laying off, extending, widening, altering and establishing of Rainier Avenue, and other streets, as public streets and highways, and for the condemnation, appropriation, taking and damaging of land and other property necessary therefor, as provided for in Ordinance No. 29364 of the City of Seattle, by the issuance and sale of bonds of the district to pay therefor.
